name: Copy 2 of TradieStop Pro - Commercial Front-End Showcase
description: A world-class, production-ready React application showcasing a multi-role platform for clients, tradies, and administrators. This app features a professional landing page, advanced UI/UX with fluid animations, robust state management, and a mock API layer. Key features include role-based dashboards with data-driven charts, universal user settings with profile uploads, a full booking and invoicing lifecycle, and a mutual review system. It is fully responsive and built to commercial standards.
